subject: Football
College Athletics
Orange Bowl (Football Game)
lead_paragraph: Alabama's Joe Namath was intercepted twice in the 1965 Orange Bowl by Pete Lammons of Texas, who would go on to be Namaths' tight end on the Jets in Super Bowl III.
snippet: Alabama's Joe Namath was intercepted twice in the 1965 Orange Bowl by Pete Lammons of Texas, who would go on to be Namaths' tight end on the Jets in Super Bowl III.
